verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: hosted] [ARG1: quite a guest list at the White House , including Sylvester Stallone and Lennox Lewis ,] [ARGM-PNC: for the posthumous pardon of heavyweight champion Jack Johnson] .
President Trump hosted [ARG2: quite a guest list] at the White House , [V: including] [ARG1: Sylvester Stallone and Lennox Lewis] , for the posthumous pardon of heavyweight champion Jack Johnson .
